alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:16PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Henry, Clay, southwestern Randolph and northwestern Early Counties through 800 PM EDT/700 PM CDT/... At 716 PM EDT/616 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Abbeville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Fort Gaines, Bellville, Haleburg, Bluffton, Shorterville, Walter F. George Lock And Dam, Walter F George Lake, Tumbleton, Edwin, Standleys Store, Grandberry Crossroads, Hayes, Watson Crossroads, Scottsboro Crossroads, Double Bridges, Ricks Place, Pecan, Graball and Dancey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
